abstract: Citigroup Alternative Investments is shutting down its Tribeca Capital Management hedge fund as its new leader, Vikram S. Pandit, puts his stamp on the long-overlooked division, The New York Times reported Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup Alternative Investments is shutting down its Tribeca Capital Management hedge fund as its new leader, Vikram S. Pandit, puts his stamp on the long-overlooked division, The New York Times reported Wednesday.

headline.main: Citi to Shut Its Tribeca Fund
